full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title and Reference Number

* 
* 

## Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number:** W8485-TSPS2023-06/A
* **Tender Closing Date:** Wednesday, January 4, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Procurement Category:** Service
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

## Description and Requirements

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the services of two (2) Intermediate Engineering Graduates to provide technical support to the Directorate Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DAEPM). The resources will be Training Device Suite (TDS) Engineers required to provide engineering services for the management of the CP-140 Aurora Training Device Suite.

The contract will be for a period of three (3) years, with two (2) one-year irrevocable options allowing Canada to extend the term of the Contract. The estimated level of effort is 240 days per year for each resource.

## Security Requirements

* 
*
